item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Teleport”) ) {
sM(“You are teleported.”);
toX = 3222;
toY = 322;
}

item.title: Teleport command
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

Hey guys I’m trying to make a teleport command, I’ve tried these codes and none of them work for some reason, I have a 317 delta.

CODE if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name without ::")) { sM("You are teleported to enter what you want"); toX = XCOORDS; toY = YCOORDS; }

if(command.startsWith("home")){ triggerTele(3092, 3492, 0); sM("home sweet home"); }
